title: Deleted But Not Gone
description:
A forensic image of a USB drive was acquired. The suspect deleted important files, but the data still exists on the disk.

What tool, available in Kali Linux, can recover deleted files by searching for known file headers (magic bytes) in a raw disk image?

This tool's name means 'most important' or 'first in rank'.

Submit as: flag{tool_name} (lowercase)
hints: This tool performs file carving based on headers, footers, and data structures
It was originally developed by the US Air Force OSI
The name is a synonym for 'primary' or 'chief'
